description.full: The new in-game physics in MotoGP 10/11 deliver the most authentic bike racing experience ever. The new rider assist feature allows you to fully customise your bike set up, giving experienced players a pure simulation experience whilst new comers can get help where they need it. The demo includes 2 playable GP class bikes in either a single ‘Championship’ race or ‘Time Trial’ mode. Download now!
